value.title: Reset a streaming dataset in Power BI (Minute Monday)
value.excerpt: In this Minute Monday, Patrick shows you how to reset data that is within a streaming datset in Power BI. He figured this out when trying to setup a demo with a streaming dataset and then wanting to start over.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: Row-Level Security in Power BI - Revisited
value.excerpt: We had some recent changes to Row-level security in Power BI. Row-level security (RLS) was moved to be configured in Power BI Desktop with the June 2016 release.  I walk through how you could can configure this now in Power BI Desktop. I also talk about some of the limitations.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in

value.title: Setting default values using COALESCE in DAX
value.excerpt: Learn how to get default values using the DAX COALESCE function instead of IF statements. A great way to avoid BLANK in Power BI!  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/dax/coalesce-function-dax  SQLBI.com article:  https://sql.bi/659297   📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************

value.title: Slicer Restatement in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at a small feature called slicer restatement in Power BI. This feature will help you to determine what was selected in a slicer. While this feature was added back in April 2018, we are betting that most folks don't know slicer restatement.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube --

value.title: Using Precedence to force Power BI Aggregations
value.excerpt: Are your Power BI Aggregations not matching? Setting Precedence can control which Power BI aggregation will be preferred. A little hint to help it on its way!  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/desktop-aggregations#aggregation-precedence  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership
